title: IVPDA poster show: Typography makes a statement
content:
This [online gallery](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010070426/http:/www.ivpda.com/cgi-local/poster_show.cgi?show=Typography) is still up on the International Vintage Poster Dealers Association website. It includes variety of styles, not just the [International Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010070426/http:/www.internationalposter.com/style_primer/international-typographic.aspx) style.

 [‹ Information on univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010070426/http:/typophile.com/node/37884 "Go to previous forum topic") [Matching Sans & Serif faces for a magazine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010070426/http:/typophile.com/node/2173 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Gus Winterbottom

comments.content: i love those vintage franch posters. what font is similar to the poster:”cendrillon”
